content: alternate between single_crochet row and more challenging row using crossed treble and double treble_crochet stitches to create the pretty lattice pattern on this crochet lapghan whether you keep things neutral like we have here in oatmeal or select one of the many other shades of red heart super saver to show off your handiwork this is sure to bring comfort to you or a loved one o go version https //www yarnspirations com/red-heart-crochet-lattice-lapghan/rhc0502-026937m html
